name: Octobservant
text:
Whenever Octobservant deals combat damage to a player, draw a card.
Flood {2}{g}{u} ({2}{g}{u}, Exile this card from your hand: Target land loses all land types and abilities and has "{T}: Add {c}." Flood only as a sorcery.) 
Whenever you flood Octobservant, that land gains "Whenever this land becomes tapped, each opponent draws a card."
